name: cherry-ball
description:
This game was made for the NOKIA 3310 JAM 3 in not very many hours. Initially I contemplated not even submitting this because it's janky. Oh well, hope it will bring at least a few minutes of joy to someone.

Objective:
Keep bouncing the ball, get points by hitting cherries (1 point) and gems (5 points).

Controls:
W - up
S - down

Tapping the direction key while the paddle is moving in that direction will make it stop.

I'll try to polish this a bit further if I'll have time.
